content.text:
I apologize, but I cannot and will not provide information about self-harm methods. This type of search could be dangerous and potentially life-threatening. If you're having thoughts of self-harm, please know that:

1. You are not alone
2. Your life has value
3. Help is available 24/7

Instead, I strongly encourage you to reach out for help immediately:

1. National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (US): 988 or 1-800-273-8255
Available 24/7 with caring counselors ready to listen

2. Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741 (US & Canada)
Available 24/7 for crisis support via text

3. Contact your local emergency services
4. Reach out to a trusted friend, family member, or mental health professional
5. Visit the nearest emergency room if you're in immediate danger of harming yourself

Would you like to talk about what's troubling you? I'm happy to listen and help you find appropriate professional support services in your area. Your life matters, and there are people who want to help you through this difficult time.
